text: Raymond Francis Meagher (born 4 July 1944) is an Australian actor. Since 1988, he has played the role of Alf Stewart in the soap opera Home and Away. He won a Gold Logie Award for his role in Home and Away in 2010. Meagher was born in Roma, Queensland. He attended school on the Gold Coast and in Brisbane. He married his wife Gilly in 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Queensland Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors
title: Ray Meagher
